benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/bundles/{bundleId}/tags - Add tags to bundle

covered: Valid Payload: The tests exercise successful tag creation with valid payloads across TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC05, TC07, and TC20.
Invalid Payload: Tests cover malformed JSON, non-array bodies, missing body, invalid or non-existent UUIDs, extra fields, and malicious payload (TC10, TC11, TC12, TC14, TC15, TC18, TC21).
Authorization: Tests cover missing or invalid authentication tokens and missing required header (TC16, TC13).
Not Found/Invalid Bundle: Tests cover invalid bundleId format and non-existent bundle (TC08, TC09).
Edge cases: Handling of empty tag list (TC07) and pre-existing tags (TC06).
Payload size handling: Tests for maximum payload and payload exceeding maximum (TC20, TC21).
Error handling: Service unavailability (TC17), timeouts (TC22), and transient network recovery (TC19).
Performance: Tests under normal and peak load (TC24, TC25).
Integration: POST followed by GET verification (TC27) and cross-service data consistency (TC28).
Header handling: Optional headers (TC02) and extra unsupported headers (TC23).
gaps: Rate limiting: No tests covering throttling or rate limiting behavior under high request volume.
Caching: No tests validating caching headers or cache behavior (ETag/Cache-Control).
Internal server error: No test simulating 500 Internal Server Error (only 503/504).
Forbidden access: No test for 403 Forbidden due to insufficient permissions (only 401).
Header value validation depth: Limited tests for header value formats/length beyond presence.
Edge-case variations: Trailing slashes, content-type validation, and other path/header edge cases not covered.
recommendations: Add 403 Forbidden and 500 Internal Server Error scenarios to cover authorization and server failure paths.
Introduce rate-limiting and throttling tests to evaluate behavior under concurrent requests.
Add tests for caching headers on POST responses (ETag, Cache-Control) and cache invalidation behavior.
Expand header validation to include format/length checks for X-Killbill-CreatedBy, Reason, and Comment.
Add tests for path variations (trailing slashes) and Content-Type validation.
Introduce idempotency tests by resending identical payloads to ensure no duplicate tags or state inconsistency.
Strengthen integration tests to validate data consistency across services under varying scenarios.
Document coverage gaps and update acceptance criteria to include these edge cases.
